name: Corellian Retort
Lore: '''Threepio, you tell that slimy piece of worm-ridden filth he''ll get no such pleasure from us!''',
Text: 'USED: Search your Reserve Deck, take one Captive Fury or Captive Pursuit into hand and reshuffle.LOST: If a bounty hunter (or gangster) and Han are involved in the same battle, you may add one battle destiny (add two if gangster is Jabba).',
